docs.snippet: Greece vice-captain Kostas Katsouranis stressed there were no rifts in the squad ahead of the World Cup after publicly apologising to team mate Giannis Maniatis for a public bust-up while playing for their clubs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece vice-captain Kostas Katsouranis stressed there were no rifts in the squad ahead of the World Cup after publicly apologising to team mate Giannis Maniatis for a public bust-up while playing for their clubs.

headline.main: Katsouranis Rejects Talk of Division in Greece Camp
headline.print_headline: Katsouranis Rejects Talk of Division in Greece Camp

docs.snippet: Disappointed Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone said his players had fallen half-a-point short in a successful season after they lost the Champions League final 4-1 to city rivals Real on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Disappointed Atletico Madrid coach Diego Simeone said his players had fallen half-a-point short in a successful season after they lost the Champions League final 4-1 to city rivals Real on Saturday.

headline.main: Simeone's Atletico Charges Fall Half-a-Point Short
headline.print_headline: Simeone's Atletico Charges Fall Half-a-Point Short

docs.snippet: Gareth Bale completed a dream first season at Real Madrid as he paid off another large slice of his world record price tag with the decisive goal in a 4-1 Champions League final triumph over Atletico Madrid on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gareth Bale completed a dream first season at Real Madrid as he paid off another large slice of his world record price tag with the decisive goal in a 4-1 Champions League final triumph over Atletico Madrid on Saturday.

headline.main: Bale Writes His Name Into Real Madrid Folklore

docs.snippet: He was identified with touch football, but the national pastime was woven through John F. Kennedy’s political career....
docs.lead_paragraph: He was identified with touch football, but the national pastime was woven through John F. Kennedy’s political career.
docs.abstract: The Upshot; photo of a young John F Kennedy posing in 1946 with stars from the Boston Red Sox and Detroit Tigers illustrates how he wove the national pastime through his political life.

byline.contributor: Michael Beschloss, a presidential historian, has written nine books.

docs.snippet: Suspected Islamist Boko Haram gunmen rampaged through three villages in northern Nigeria, killing 28 people and burning houses to the ground in a pattern of violence that has become almost a daily occurrence, according to police and witnesses....
docs.lead_paragraph: Suspected Islamist Boko Haram gunmen rampaged through three villages in northern Nigeria, killing 28 people and burning houses to the ground in a pattern of violence that has become almost a daily occurrence, according to police and witnesses.

headline.main: Nigeria's Boko Haram Kills 28 in Three Village Attacks
headline.print_headline: Nigeria's Boko Haram Kills 28 in Three Village Attacks

docs.snippet: Ten-man Queens Park Rangers snatched a 90th-minute goal through substitute Bobby Zamora to clinch promotion to the Premier League with a 1-0 win against Derby County in the Championship playoff final at Wembley on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ten-man Queens Park Rangers snatched a 90th-minute goal through substitute Bobby Zamora to clinch promotion to the Premier League with a 1-0 win against Derby County in the Championship playoff final at Wembley on Saturday.

headline.main: Late Zamora Goal Sends 10-Man QPR Into Premier League
headline.print_headline: Late Zamora Goal Sends 10-Man QPR Into Premier League

docs.snippet: Aron Johannsson angered a few folks back home in Iceland when he chose to make his World Cup bid with the United States and not his parents' homeland where they still live today....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aron Johannsson angered a few folks back home in Iceland when he chose to make his World Cup bid with the United States and not his parents' homeland where they still live today.

headline.main: US Forward Johannsson Proud of Icelandic Roots
headline.print_headline: US Forward Johannsson Proud of Icelandic Roots

docs.snippet: Timothy M. Dolan, the archbishop of New York and once the go-to American cardinal for many in the Vatican, is navigating changes in the Roman Catholic world wrought by the election of Pope Francis....
docs.lead_paragraph: Timothy M. Dolan, the archbishop of New York and once the go-to American cardinal for many in the Vatican, is navigating changes in the Roman Catholic world wrought by the election of Pope Francis.
docs.abstract: Cardinal Timothy M Dolan, Archbishop of New York, is navigating changes in the Roman Catholic Church wrought by the election of Pope Francis; once the go-to American cardinal for many in the Vatican, Dolan, whose lifestyle is comfortable if not extravagant, says he has reflected upon Francis's call for bishops to act more like humble parish priests.

headline.main: In Era of Humble Pope, Earth Shifts Under Cardinal Dolan
headline.print_headline: In Era of Humble Pope, Earth Shifts Under Dolan
